proposals.job_title: GoHighLevel Email Specalist
proposals.description: improving our email deliverability on our GoHighLevel account. Currently a lot of our emails are going to spam and im not sure what is causing this.
proposals.message:
Hey there,

"A lot of our emails are going to spam" – I totally get that frustration. I remember helping a local bakery who had the *most* amazing offers but nobody saw them because of spam filters. It's like shouting into a void.

Based on your need, here's how I'd tackle it: First, I'd audit your GoHighLevel setup to pinpoint any deliverability red flags. Next, we'll dive into your email content itself to see if anything's triggering spam filters. Finally, I'd work on properly authenticating your domain and email setup so emails are coming from a verified source and are trusted.

I'd be happy to jump on a quick call to chat more about your specific situation and how to get those emails landing in inboxes.

proposals.job_title: YouTube Automation Channel Development
proposals.description: We are seeking an experienced freelancer to help us build a YouTube automation channel from the ground up. The ideal candidate will guide us through the process of content creation, video optimization, and channel management to maximize engagement and growth. You should have a creative mindset and solid knowledge of YouTube algorithms. Familiarity with automation tools is a plus. If you are passionate about YouTube and have a proven track record, we want to hear from you!
proposals.message:
Hey there,

"Building a YouTube automation channel from the ground up"... I get that. I remember back in 2015, trying to optimize videos manually for a client. It was basically a full-time job just keeping up!

Seeing that you’re aiming for engagement and growth, I’d suggest a three-pronged approach: First, we'll map out a content strategy that aligns with YouTube's algorithm (I’ve found niche targeting to be really effective). Second, we'll streamline the video production process to get more content out faster. Third, we’ll use analytics to identify opportunities for growth.

Happy to jump on a quick call if you'd like to chat about your goals and how I might be able to assist.

proposals.job_title: Data Analyst/ Market Researcher
proposals.description:
Job Title: Data Analyst / Market Researcher
Location: Remote | Type: Part Time

We’re hiring a Data Analyst / Market Researcher to turn data into clear insights and compelling presentations. Ideal candidates have strong analytical skills and are fluent in:

    Microsoft Excel (advanced)

    PowerPoint (client-ready decks)

    InDesign (report layouts)

    AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, automation tools)

Requirements:
2+ years in data analysis or market research, with a sharp eye for detail and de...
proposals.message:
Hey there,

"Turning data into clear insights and compelling presentations" – I get that completely. Early in my career, I spent weeks wrestling with pivot tables and manually formatting reports; it nearly broke me! That's actually what got me into automation in the first place.

For your project, I'd start by: 1) using Excel's Power Query to pull and clean the data, focusing on efficiency, 2) leveraging AI tools for initial pattern discovery and identifying key narratives, and then 3) crafting visually engaging PowerPoint decks that tell a clear story. I can also help with the InDesign side of things to create a polished report.

If you’d like to chat about how I could streamline the process for you, let me know. I’m always happy to brainstorm.

proposals.job_title: Google Analytics Implementation into Next.JS Commerce Site
proposals.description:
About Us:
We are launching a brand-new Next.js eCommerce site and are seeking an experienced Google Analytics developer to implement key tracking elements that will provide deep insights into traffic and purchase behavior. If you're an expert in GA4 and event tracking, we want to hear from you.

Job Description:
As a Google Analytics Developer, you will be responsible for implementing key triggers and data elements into our Next.js website using best practices for Google Analytics to generate th...
proposals.message:
Hey there,

Saw you're launching a new Next.js eCommerce site and need deep insights into traffic and purchase behavior. Makes sense, getting GA4 right from the start is crucial!

I remember helping a client migrate to GA4 last year, and the biggest headache was retroactively mapping their existing events to the new data model. We ended up spending way too much time cleaning up the data.

For your project, I'd suggest first diving into the existing Next.js setup, then creating a clear event tracking plan tailored to your specific customer journey, and finally implementing those events with best-practice GA4 code and debugging.

Would love to chat briefly about your store and how you envision tracking those key interactions. Let me know if you're free for a quick call!

proposals.job_title: Barcode Extraction and Integration Specialist
proposals.description: We are seeking a skilled freelancer to develop a code solution that will extract barcodes from an Excel file and seamlessly integrate them into specific locations within our cloud-based pricing software. The ideal candidate will possess experience in data extraction and software integration. If you are proficient in automating data workflows and have a solid understanding of cloud applications, we would love to hear from you.
proposals.message:
Hi there,

"Seamless integration into our cloud-based pricing software" – I get it. Those integrations can be tricky! I once spent a week wrestling with an old accounting system that just *refused* to play nice with a new inventory platform. Learned a lot about data mapping the hard way!

For your barcode project, I'd start by thoroughly examining your Excel file's structure, then focus on building a small script to extract those barcodes cleanly. After that, we'd concentrate on securely integrating them into the specific fields within your cloud software – ensuring data accuracy is paramount.

Would love to chat more about the specifics of your setup and how I can help. Let me know when you're free for a quick call.

Manual setup and management of lead magnets
Lack of automation in email marketing leading to missed opportunities

solution_architecture.webhook_strategy: Set up webhooks to trigger email sequences in Klaviyo based on ad interactions and lead magnet submissions.
solution_architecture.error_handling: Implement logging and alerting using Zapier's built-in error handling and monitoring features.
solution_architecture.scalability_design: Design the solution to handle increased ad spend and email volume by leveraging Zapier's scalable infrastructure.

technical_tasks: Audit current ad and email processes
implementation_roadmap.client_involvement: Provide access to current ad accounts and Klaviyo

implementation_roadmap.testing_approach: Conduct end-to-end testing with sample data to ensure accuracy

implementation_roadmap.success_metrics: Reduction in manual tasks, increase in lead conversion rates

business_impact.time_savings: Save approximately 20 hours/week by automating ad management and email workflows

business_impact.error_elimination: Eliminate 90% of manual errors in ad and email processes
business_impact.efficiency_gains: Increase productivity by 30% through streamlined workflows
business_impact.roi_timeline: Expect ROI within 6 months of implementation

competitive_advantages.relevant_experience: Successfully automated ad and email workflows for a leading e-commerce brand, resulting in a 25% increase in lead conversions.
competitive_advantages.technical_expertise: Deep expertise in integrating Google Ads, Meta Ads, and Klaviyo using Zapier.
competitive_advantages.unique_approach: Focus on creating a seamless integration that maximizes ad spend efficiency and enhances lead nurturing.
competitive_advantages.post_launch_support: Offer 3 months of post-launch support and optimization to ensure continued success.

technologies_used: Zapier's built-in monitoring and logging tools

proposals.job_title: Full-stack dev with attention to visual detail
proposals.description:
My client has a Ferry Booking system (via custom API - no documentatiion. I will act as middleman). We tried to implement the query & booking & payment system. While doing so, unfortunately the developer is no longer available to complete the work. So we need to re-implement the frontend again with the updates (without changing a dot (client is very strict on exact frontend)).
Current setup is pure HTML pages. You will need to work on HTML pages and JavaScript only... Like I said, client is very...
proposals.message:
Okay, here's my attempt:

Hey there,

"Need to re-implement the frontend again...client is very strict on exact frontend" - I definitely understand the need to respect an existing, visually-defined product! I once spent a week recreating a specific font rendering bug for a client because *removing* it was a deal-breaker for them.

For this ferry booking system, I'd start by thoroughly reverse-engineering the existing HTML and Javascript to fully understand the interactions. Then, working closely with you as the middleman, implement the necessary updates while *exactly* preserving the current look and feel. After that, rigorous testing across different browsers to ensure pixel-perfect parity.

If you think this sounds good, I'm happy to hop on a quick call to discuss the API and specific challenges in more detail.

proposals.job_title: Full Stack AI Automation and Web Scraping Engineer Needed
proposals.description: We are seeking a skilled Full Stack AI Automation and Web Scraping Engineer to enhance our data-driven projects. The ideal candidate will have experience in developing automated systems using AI technologies and extracting data from various web sources. You will work on building efficient pipelines for data collection and processing, as well as implementing machine learning models. A strong understanding of both front-end and back-end development is essential. If you are passionate about automat...
proposals.message:
Hey there,

Saw you're looking for someone to really streamline your data-driven projects with automation, specifically tackling web scraping and AI implementation. That resonates – I've spent the last 20 years neck-deep in this stuff.

I actually just wrapped up a project where the client was manually compiling market research data; it was taking them weeks. By building a custom scraping tool integrated with a basic NLP model, we cut that down to a few hours.

For you, I'd think we could start with a quick audit of your current data collection process, then build out a robust scraping pipeline, and finally look at integrating some AI tools to automate analysis and reporting.

If this approach sounds interesting, I'm happy to jump on a quick call to chat through the specifics. No pressure either way.

proposals.job_title: Offline AI Coding Assistant Development
proposals.description: We are seeking an experienced developer to create an offline AI coding assistant using Ollama-supported models that can run locally. The ideal candidate will be well-versed in AI model integration and possess the ability to tailor the assistant for coding tasks. Responsibilities include designing the system architecture, implementing the model, and ensuring optimal performance. If you have a passion for AI and coding, and are ready to tackle a challenging project, we want to hear from you! Write...
proposals.message:
Hey there,

Saw you're looking to build an offline AI coding assistant – "tackle a challenging project" indeed! I've been tinkering with local AI models for a while now. Actually, just last month I was trying to get a similar setup running on a Raspberry Pi for a personal project, and learned a few things the hard way about optimizing performance on limited resources.

Here's how I'd approach it for you: First, a deep dive into selecting the right Ollama model for your specific coding needs. Then, designing a lean system architecture that prioritizes speed and offline functionality. Finally, rigorous testing to ensure it's actually helpful and not just spitting out random code snippets.

Would love to chat more about your vision for the assistant and see if my experience aligns with what you're hoping to achieve. Let me know if you're free for a quick call.

proposals.job_title: MVP Development for Habit-Tracking App with Gamification Features
proposals.description:
I’m looking for a developer to help build an MVP for a mobile habit-forming app. The app should be clean, modern, and user-friendly—visually appealing but minimal, with no fluff. It will include preset daily and weekly challenges across different categories, with the ability for users to create their own custom challenges (if they subscribe to the top tier).

The app needs to include basic gamification features, including XP, streaks, and progress tracking. There will also be a lightweight socia...
proposals.message:
Hey there,

I saw you're looking for a dev to build an MVP for your habit-tracking app with gamification – especially with the preset challenges and custom challenges for the top tier. That detail about subscriptions unlocking the custom challenges? Smart move for monetization.

I remember years ago, automating a lead-gen system where that tiered access model was crucial. Initially, free users complained about limitations, but the conversion to paid once they experienced the basic value was significant. The key was making the free features *good* and the paid features *obviously better*.

For your app, I'd suggest focusing first on nailing the core habit tracking with basic gamification features. Once that’s solid, we could then concentrate on the subscription model and the custom challenges, integrating them smoothly without disrupting the user experience. Then, finally we'd look at the social integration.

I’d love to chat more about your vision for the app. Shoot me a message if you're interested!

proposals.job_title: Seeking U.S. Immigration Attorney for EB2-NIW Startup Case (Tech-based, with ProfVal support)
proposals.description:
My name is Phung Anh Vinh, a senior automation and IoT engineer based in Vietnam with over 30 years of experience. I am preparing to file an EB-2 NIW petition based on a startup business plan in the U.S. (Texas) focused on low-cost IoT and automation solutions for agriculture and environmental control.

I have completed:

A draft business plan (can be refined)

A technical resume (with detailed project history)

Summaries of 3 impactful IoT projects

Ongoing coordination with ProfVal for profess...
proposals.message:
Hi Phung Anh Vinh,

The need for *low-cost* IoT solutions for agriculture definitely resonated with me. I've seen first-hand how expensive some of these systems can be, putting them out of reach for many smaller farms and businesses.

A few years back, I worked on a project automating a small hydroponics operation, and the biggest hurdle was always finding affordable sensors and actuators.

Regarding your EB-2 NIW petition, I'd be happy to help in any way I can. Given your focus and ProfVal support, it feels like the first step would be to refine your business plan, maybe highlighting the innovative aspects that address the need for cost reduction specifically. - Aggregates results into a Gold layer

"Hey there,

I once spent three days trying to explain the difference between serif and sans-serif fonts to a client who just wanted his logo a *little* bigger. Never again, for either of us!

proposals.message:
Hi Team!

Your workflow automation project caught my attention. I've created a tailored solution approach: http://192.168.1.107/proposals/proposal-AI-Workflow-Automation-Expert-for-SEOAds-Agency-1748872452.html

I specialize in automation systems and have extensive experience with similar implementations.

Happy to discuss your requirements and timeline.

Best regards,
Tim Poulton

client_intelligence.current_manual_process: Manual data collection and analysis for SEO and advertising campaigns, manual reporting, and inefficient client communication processes.
primary_pain_points: Time-consuming manual data processing
Inconsistent reporting accuracy
Delayed client communication
client_intelligence.volume_scale: High volume of SEO data and advertising metrics processed daily

solution_architecture.core_solution: Implement AI-driven automation workflows using n8n to streamline data collection, analysis, and reporting. Integrate OpenAI for natural language processing to enhance client communication and automate routine inquiries.
solution_architecture.platform_choice: n8n for its flexibility and open-source nature, allowing for custom integrations and scalability.
solution_architecture.webhook_strategy: Set up webhooks to trigger workflows based on data updates and client interactions, ensuring real-time processing.
solution_architecture.error_handling: Implement logging and alerting mechanisms within n8n to monitor workflow execution and handle exceptions gracefully.
solution_architecture.scalability_design: Design workflows with modular components to easily accommodate increased data volume and additional services as the agency grows.

implementation_roadmap.client_involvement: Provide access to current systems and data sources

implementation_roadmap.testing_approach: Conduct unit and integration testing to ensure data accuracy and workflow reliability

implementation_roadmap.success_metrics: Reduction in manual processing time, improved reporting accuracy, enhanced client satisfaction

business_impact.time_savings: Save approximately 20 hours/week by automating data processing and reporting
business_impact.cost_reduction: $15,000 annually by reducing manual labor and improving efficiency
business_impact.error_elimination: Reduce reporting errors by 90% through automated data handling
business_impact.efficiency_gains: Increase productivity by 30% with streamlined workflows
business_impact.roi_timeline: Achieve ROI within 6 months of implementation

competitive_advantages.relevant_experience: Successfully implemented similar automation solutions for digital marketing agencies, enhancing their operational efficiency.
competitive_advantages.technical_expertise: Deep expertise in n8n, OpenAI, and Google APIs, ensuring seamless integration and robust automation.
competitive_advantages.unique_approach: Tailored AI-driven solutions that not only automate but also enhance client interaction through natural language processing.
competitive_advantages.post_launch_support: Offer ongoing support and optimization to adapt workflows as business needs evolve.

technologies_used: Custom Python scripts for data manipulation
Monitoring tools like Sentry for error tracking

project_summary.title_professional: AI Workflow Automation Specialist for Digital Marketing
project_summary.description_executive: Design and implement AI-driven automation workflows to streamline SEO and advertising processes, enhance client communication, and improve operational efficiency using n8n and OpenAI.
project_summary.timeline_realistic: 20 days from project initiation to full deployment
project_summary.budget_justification: The proposed solution delivers exceptional value by significantly reducing manual workload, improving accuracy, and enhancing client satisfaction, ensuring a swift return on investment.

analysis.problem_analysis: Manual data collection and analysis for SEO and advertising campaigns, manual reporting, and inefficient client communication processes.
analysis.proposed_solution: Implement AI-driven automation workflows using n8n to streamline data collection, analysis, and reporting. Integrate OpenAI for natural language processing to enhance client communication and automate routine inquiries.
analysis.technical_details: n8n for its flexibility and open-source nature, allowing for custom integrations and scalability.
analysis.timeline: 20 days from project initiation to full deployment
analysis.why_me: Tailored AI-driven solutions that not only automate but also enhance client interaction through natural language processing.

proposals.title: MySQL CMP Setup with LLM Integration for Account and Inventory Queries
proposals.message:
Hi Team!

Your systems integration project caught my attention. I've created a tailored solution approach: http://192.168.1.107/proposals/proposal-MySQL-CMP-Setup-with-LLM-Integration-for-Account-a-1748872421.html

I specialize in automation systems and have extensive experience with similar implementations.

Happy to discuss your requirements and timeline.

Best regards,
Tim Poulton

client_intelligence.industry_context: Likely in retail or distribution given the focus on account and inventory data
client_intelligence.current_manual_process: Currently, they might be manually querying their MySQL database for account and inventory data, which is time-consuming and prone to human error.
client_intelligence.technical_stack: MySQL database, potential use of a Language Learning Model (LLM) for AI-driven queries
primary_pain_points: Manual data querying is inefficient
High potential for human error in data retrieval
Slow response times to data queries
client_intelligence.volume_scale: Not specified, but likely significant given the need for automation and AI integration

solution_architecture.core_solution: Implement a MySQL CMP integrated with an LLM to automate and optimize account and inventory queries. This will involve setting up a robust API layer for seamless interaction between the database and the LLM.
solution_architecture.platform_choice: n8n for its flexibility and open-source nature, allowing for custom integrations and scalability.
solution_architecture.webhook_strategy: Set up webhooks to trigger LLM queries based on specific database events or user requests.
solution_architecture.error_handling: Implement logging and monitoring using tools like Sentry to capture and address errors in real-time.
solution_architecture.scalability_design: Design the solution to handle increased data volumes by leveraging cloud-based infrastructure and scalable API endpoints.

implementation_roadmap.client_involvement: Provide access to current MySQL database and any existing documentation

technical_tasks: Develop API layer for MySQL and LLM
implementation_roadmap.testing_approach: Conduct unit and integration testing to ensure seamless data flow and accurate query responses

implementation_roadmap.success_metrics: Reduction in query response time, increased accuracy of data retrieval

business_impact.time_savings: Estimated 20 hours/week saved by automating manual queries
business_impact.cost_reduction: $15,000 annually by reducing manual labor and errors
business_impact.error_elimination: Up to 90% reduction in data retrieval errors
business_impact.efficiency_gains: 50% faster response times for data queries
business_impact.roi_timeline: Full ROI expected within 6 months post-implementation

competitive_advantages.relevant_experience: Successfully integrated AI-driven query systems for multiple retail clients, enhancing data accessibility and accuracy.
competitive_advantages.technical_expertise: Deep expertise in MySQL, AI integrations, and automation platforms like n8n.
competitive_advantages.unique_approach: Custom-tailored solutions that leverage open-source tools for flexibility and cost-effectiveness.
competitive_advantages.post_launch_support: Offer ongoing support and optimization services to ensure the system adapts to evolving business needs.

project_summary.title_professional: MySQL and LLM Integration Specialist for Automated Data Queries
project_summary.description_executive: Develop a seamless integration between your MySQL database and a Language Learning Model to automate and enhance account and inventory queries, reducing manual effort and increasing data accuracy.
project_summary.timeline_realistic: 20 days from project kickoff to full deployment
project_summary.budget_justification: The proposed solution delivers exceptional value by significantly reducing manual labor costs and improving data accuracy, ensuring a swift return on investment.

analysis.problem_analysis: Currently, they might be manually querying their MySQL database for account and inventory data, which is time-consuming and prone to human error.
analysis.proposed_solution: Implement a MySQL CMP integrated with an LLM to automate and optimize account and inventory queries. This will involve setting up a robust API layer for seamless interaction between the database and the LLM.
analysis.technical_details: n8n for its flexibility and open-source nature, allowing for custom integrations and scalability.
analysis.timeline: 20 days from project kickoff to full deployment
analysis.why_me: Custom-tailored solutions that leverage open-source tools for flexibility and cost-effectiveness.

proposals.job_title: Braze CRM & Communication Manager – Long-term role at the fastest growing camping app 🚐💨
proposals.description:
Join the adventure. We’re Campy, a startup with over 1 million users. We help motorhome campers find the best camp spots across Europe. We’re now hiring a Communication Manager to bring our messaging to life through email, push, and in-app experiences, using Braze CRM. 

This is a remote, flexible, freelance position with serious long-term potential. We’re looking for someone who wants to grow with us over the next 2+ years – not just complete a few tasks and move on. You’ll have autonomy, varie...

I noticed you're struggling with manual processes in your general business.

Having automated 200+ similar businesses, I can help you save 15+ hours weekly through smart integrations.

My approach:
1. Map your current workflow and identify bottlenecks
2. Build custom automations using Zapier, Make.com

Last month, I helped a similar client reduce manual work by 70% while improving accuracy.

I'd love to discuss your specific needs. When would be a good time for a quick call?

Best,
Timothy

Project Description:

Workflow Overview:

proposals.description:
Hello!
I bought this template https://n8n.io/workflows/2814-2-way-sync-google-contacts-and-notion/ The template is complex and I need you to fully set it up and modify it to my workflow.
I have 94 fields in my Google Contacts and they all need to sync error free to my Notion database. As there are many nodes there will be a lot of fields’ mapping (i.e. manual work).
